response.overview: Hollywood is starting to end. It’s falling apart to the point that taking the sign down is in consideration. With people losing interest in sequels and an increasing amount of scandals involved in the industry, they lost money to the point that they’re putting their trust and funds in an original blockbuster movie as their last hope. When one fresh face auditions, he is met with major criticism due to his terrible performance, causing him to spiral.  Even with his failure, he is committed to making it in the industry, taking the risk to lose his loved ones that don’t believe that he can make it if it gives him the chance to follow his dreams.
response.title: End of Hollywood
